statements: SELECT * FROM customer_foot_traffic_data;
SELECT customer_id, timestamp FROM customer_foot_traffic_data WHERE entrance_detected = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, store_id, timestamp FROM customer_foot_traffic_data WHERE store_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_foot_traffic_data WHERE entrance_detected = TRUE AND exit_detected = FALSE;
SELECT MIN(timestamp), MAX(timestamp) FROM customer_foot_traffic_data;
SELECT customer_id, store_id FROM customer_foot_traffic_data WHERE entrance_detected = TRUE AND exit_detected = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM customer_foot_traffic_data WHERE store_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, timestamp FROM customer_foot_traffic_data WHERE store_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT store_id FROM customer_foot_traffic_data;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM customer_foot_traffic_data WHERE entrance_detected = TRUE GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5;
SELECT store_name, location_lat, location_long FROM store_locations
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM store_locations WHERE location_lat > 10.0
SELECT * FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_name DESC
SELECT customer_id, store_id, visit_date FROM customer_foot_traffic WHERE purchase_amount > 50.0
SELECT SUM(visit_duration) AS total_duration FROM customer_foot_traffic
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM store_locations WHERE location_lat > 40 AND location_long < -70;
SELECT * FROM store_locations WHERE store_name LIKE '%Mart%' ORDER BY store_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, visit_date, visit_duration FROM customer_foot_traffic WHERE visit_duration > 30 ORDER BY visit_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase FROM customer_foot_traffic GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase > 100;
SELECT store_id, AVG(visit_duration) AS avg_duration FROM customer_foot_traffic GROUP BY store_id;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, income FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location_geography FROM store_locations;
SELECT foot_traffic_id, store_id, customer_id, entrance_time, exit_time FROM foot_traffic_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, gender, income FROM customer_demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age < 30
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT store_name, location_geography FROM store_locations
SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE entrance_time >= '2022-01-01' AND exit_time < '2022-02-01'

SELECT cd.customer_id, cd.gender, sl.store_name FROM customer_demographics cd JOIN foot_traffic_data ftd ON cd.customer_id = ftd.customer_id JOIN store_locations sl ON ftd.store_id = sl.store_id ORDER BY cd.age ASC
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT customer_name, store_id FROM customers WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, store_id, entry_time FROM foot_traffic WHERE entry_time > '2021-10-01';
SELECT customer_id, store_id, entry_time, exit_time FROM foot_traffic WHERE store_id = 2 ORDER BY exit_time DESC;
SELECT store_name, location, manager_id FROM stores WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, entry_time FROM customers WHERE store_id = 3;
SELECT store_name, location, manager_id FROM stores WHERE manager_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, entry_time, exit_time FROM foot_traffic WHERE store_id = 2 ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT manager_name, store_id FROM managers WHERE manager_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY store_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM StoreLocations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_name, location_lat, location_long FROM StoreLocations WHERE location_lat > 40.0;
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM StoreLocations ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT location_long, location_lat FROM StoreLocations WHERE store_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM StoreLocations WHERE location_lat < 30.0 ORDER BY location_lat ASC;
SELECT store_name, location_lat, location_long FROM StoreLocations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_name FROM StoreLocations WHERE location_long < 0;
SELECT * FROM StoreLocations ORDER BY location_lat DESC;
SELECT store_name, location_lat, location_long FROM StoreLocations WHERE location_lat BETWEEN 30.0 AND 40.0;
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM StoreLocations WHERE location_long > -100 ORDER BY store_id ASC;
